intro.title: Values & Committed Action
description: Find the direction of life you truly want without being swept away by anxiety.
Values are like a compass, not a destination.
Discover what's important in your life and take a small step toward those values.
intro.contentDescription: Discover values that will become your life's compass, and plan specific actions aligned with those values.
steps: 1. Explore values that are important in your life.
2. Reflect deeply on your chosen value.
3. Plan a small committed action toward that value.
intro.tip: Tip: Values are not goals to achieve. They are the direction of living and the criteria for every choice.

step1.title: What values are important to you?
step1.description: From the values in the circle below, choose what matters most in your life right now.

step2.title: Why is this value important?
step2.description: Think about why your chosen value is important in your life.
step2.placeholder: This value is important to me because...

step3.title: What small action can you take for this value?
step3.description: Write down one small action you can do today that aligns with this value.
step3.placeholder: A small action I can do today...

result.title: You've taken the first step toward your values
result.description: The value you chose becomes your life's compass. Even when anxiety comes, remember this value and keep moving forward one step at a time. Small committed actions build a meaningful life.
